title: Renampun
author: Renampun
created_time: October 29, 2022, 07:21:44 PMLast edit: November 27, 2024, 10:38:30 PM by Renampun
content: #editYou are free to discuss anything here, of course about Halloween

comments.author: mich
comments.body: When I saw the news about the tragedy that took place in South Korea at the Halloween Festival, at first, I really did not understand what was going on. But witnesses and survivors were being interviewed by the news reporter and began explaining how the tragedy took place. I could not believe that more than 150 died and hundreds more were injured in a crowd rush. It is still unclear what may have caused the incident, although local media reported it may have begun when people started filing a narrow alley in one of the city’s prominent party spots the Hamilton Hotel. People began crowding a nearby bar after a celebrity unexpectedly showed up.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Why need celebrating of the dead when it will bring another death ?

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: there were too many people in those alleys in South Korea, the forces of law and order should perhaps have been more careful

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: peter0425 on November 06, 2022, 09:11:33 AMWhy need celebrating of the dead when it will bring another death ?I don’t think the OP is celebrating the deaths. He’s clearly just posting tragedies that have unfortunately occurred around the recent Halloween holidays.Most deaths are tragic & so sad. The deaths highlighted by the OP are no different. May the all rest in peace & God be with their grief stricken families.
